api_list.name: Get BNPL Rules
Check if  BNPL Transaction Pre-authorized
Authorize BNPL Transaction
Pre-authorize BNPL Transaction
Get Special Offer IDs Associated with Commerce Transaction
api_list.description: Get Special Offer IDs Associated with Commerce Transaction
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bnpl-management.p.rapidapi.com/v1/bnpl-management/offers"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bnpl-management.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://bnpl-management.p.rapidapi.com/v1/bnpl-management/offers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bnpl-management.p.rapidapi.com"
